headline: Connected Packaging Market Industry Trends, Key Growth Drivers, Challenges, Future Opportunities, and Regulatory Landscape 2025-2034
summary: Demand for smart packaging like QR codes and NFC tags drives this growth, enhancing consumer engagement with real-time product data and improving traceability. Despite initial cost hikes from trade tariffs, U.S. and European firms are investing in local manufacturing, fostering innovation. Key players including Amcor and Avery Dennison focus on smart, sustainable solutions to meet rising consumer demands. Anti-counterfeiting laws further boost market demand across sectors such as FMCG and health
